p: Plant species identified as being highly understudied are M. lycopodioides (DoP total = 2 (1)), M. kandtiana (DoP total = 2 (2)), F. saussureana (DoP total = 3 (3)), S. calycinum subsp. angustifolium (DoP total = 5 (4)), C. buchananii (DoP total = 6 (5)), and L. calostachys (DoP total = 12 (4)). Numbers in brackets correspond to absolute numbers of journal articles from publishing houses with COPE membership.
